name: Nutrition Monitoring
content: Keep note of Robin's food intake and ensure a balanced diet with fruits, vegetables, grains, dairy, and sweet foods, considering Robin enjoys all these options. Monitor and document any discomfort or reactions to new foods.

name: Developmental Milestone Assessment
content: Evaluate Robin's developmental progress and identify areas needing support, especially due to the slight delays observed.

name: Allergy Management
content: Ensure all tuna-containing foods are avoided. Educate the nanny or babysitter about Robin's tuna allergy and ensure they know how to respond in case of exposure.

name: Pending Immunizations
content: Schedule and administer Robin's pending immunizations.

name: Nutritional Concerns Consultation
content: Discuss and address any specific dietary concerns with a nutritionist.

name: Language and Communication Activities
content: Engage Robin in activities that foster language skills and communication. Use picture books, singing, and talking to bolster this skill.

name: Physical Activity
content: Incorporate regular physical activity into Robin's routine. Ensure activities are fun and safe, encouraging gross and fine motor skill development.

name: Sleep Routine Establishment
content: Establish and maintain a consistent sleep routine for Robin to support overall health and development.

name: Parental Support
content: Provide Rachel with resources and guidance on child development, nutrition, and managing mild food discomfort.

name: Environmental Health Check
content: Ensure that Robin's living environment is safe and free from allergens or any health hazards.

name: Social Skills Development
content: Encourage social interactions with other children under supervision to develop Robin's social skills.

name: Seasonal Health Tips
content: Provide Rachel with tips on keeping Robin safe and healthy during the summer months.

name: Teething and Oral Health
content: Monitor Robin's teething process and ensure proper oral hygiene practices are in place.

name: Safety Measures Education
content: Educate Rachel and the nanny on essential safety measures at home and outdoors.
